member.name: M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Razor.LanguageClient.Cohost.HtmlDocumentSynchronizer.GetSynchronizationRequestTaskAsync(Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.TextDocument,Microsoft.VisualStudio.Razor.LanguageClient.Cohost.HtmlDocumentSynchronizer.RazorDocumentVersion,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Returns a task that will complete when the html document for the Razor document has been made available
member.remarks:
Whilst this is a task-returning method, really its not is to manage the dictionary. When this method is called, one of 3 things could happen:
Nobody has asked for that document before, or they asked but the task failed, so a new task is started and returned
Somebody else already asked for that document, so you get the task they were given
Somebody else already asked for a future version of that document, so you get nothing
If option 1 is taken, any pending tasks for older versions of the document will be cancelled.

member.name: T:Microsoft.VisualStudioCode.RazorExtension.Services.InProcServiceFactory
member.remarks: This class holds instances in a static field. This should work fine in tests, since brokered service factories are intended to be stateless. However, if a factory is introduced that maintains state, this class will need to be revisited to avoid holding onto state across tests.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.Razor.LanguageServer.LspLogger
member.summary: ILogger implementation that logs via the razor/log LSP method
member.remarks: The handler for this custom log message is implemented in the C# extension and is responsible for writing the message to the output window.
